name: IMDb Redesign
description: Material/flat design for Title, Name and Profile pages. Practically doesn't affect the Main/News page. Works only with the new site layout! Uncheck 'Show reference view' in Site Preferences.
additional_info:

[14.11.15] 1.1.0 - Fixes
[29.10.15] 1.0.0 - Initial Release

style_setting_options.label: Hide rating and show it on hover
